code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const LoginPage=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[userType,setUserType]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!email||!password||!userType){alert('All fields are required!');return;}try{const response=await axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/login',{email,password,userType});if(response.data.message==='Login successful!'){alert('Login successful!');navigate('/dashboard');}else{alert(response.data.error||'Login failed.');}}catch(error){alert('Login failed: '+(error.response?error.response.data.error:'Unknown error'));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:styles.container,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleLogin,style:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{style:styles.header,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true,style:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true,style:styles.input}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:userType,onChange:e=>setUserType(e.target.value),required:true,style:styles.select,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"",disabled:true,children:"Select user type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Employee",children:"Employee"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{value:"Admin",children:"Admin"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",style:styles.button,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:styles.linkContainer,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/forgot-password",style:styles.link,children:"Forgot Password?"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:styles.linkContainer,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"/signup",style:styles.link,children:"Sign up"})]})})]})});};const styles={container:{display:'flex',justifyContent:'center',marginTop:'100px',backgroundColor:'#f9f9f9',height:'100vh',alignItems:'center'},form:{display:'flex',flexDirection:'column',width:'300px',padding:'20px',boxShadow:'0 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)',borderRadius:'8px',backgroundColor:'white'},header:{textAlign:'center',marginBottom:'20px',color:'#333'},input:{marginBottom:'10px',padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'4px'},select:{marginBottom:'10px',padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'4px'},button:{padding:'10px',fontSize:'16px',backgroundColor:'#4CAF50',color:'white',border:'none',borderRadius:'5px',cursor:'pointer',transition:'background-color 0.3s'},buttonHover:{backgroundColor:'#45a049'},linkContainer:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'10px'},link:{color:'#007BFF',textDecoration:'none',fontSize:'14px'}};export default LoginPage;
